nodes.text: Rirsack was a planet located in the Belsmuth sector of the Outer Rim. Lieutenant Lar Ndigo of the New Republic bravely fought there sometime during or prior to 13 ABY.

The planet Rirsack was mentioned twice in the comic series Star Wars: Crimson Empire III—Empire Lost by Mike Richardson, debuting in October 2011. The planet was spelled "Rirsack" in Crimson Empire III: Empire Lost 1 and "Rorsack" in Empire Lost 4. The proper spelling was confirmed by the Essential Atlas Online Companion.
